1476964541783289862.text: It’s no secret that it will take a lot to change how Washington does business, but I will not stop working until we have restored fiscal discipline in our nation’s capital.

1476964540239785993.text: Since I was elected to represent OH-14, I've returned over $1 million to the Treasury. Fiscal responsibility is needed to create a stronger, more prosperous USA for the next generation, which is why I began returning unused taxpayer funds back when I was Geauga County Prosecutor.

1476964536901115905.text: Considering that the U.S. is rapidly approaching $29 trillion in debt, each year I request that any unused funds from my office be transferred to the Treasury to help reduce the deficit. Below is my letter to the Chief Administrative Officer with this year's request. https://t.co/pSVTqy42xl

1187085173273321472.text: Sadly, #Ohio is one of the states hit hardest by the #opioidcrisis. Last year alone, Ohio EMS providers administered 36,944 doses of nalaxone. That number isn’t just a statistic. It represents the lives of mothers/fathers, sons/daughters, and friends/loved ones saved.
